channel.title: Sdk on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Sdk on PR

item.title: Integrating Chromecast with Kaltura SDK (iOS)
item.description: Their documentation says it is built in, but I couldn’t find a sample anywhere, so here it is for everyone on how to integrate Chromecast with your Kaltura Player.

item.title: Developing iOS application for salesforce [How to]
item.description:
Here are the collection of snippets to do CRUD operation with ZKSforce (Force.com toolkit for iOS).

Remember this is a SOAP based API, there is a new alternative library available from salesforce called MobileSDK for iOS.

item.title: iCloud Gotchas
item.description: Integrating iCloud with core data was easy when I found this tutorial, but I ran into few issues while implementing and testing it on devices. And here are the steps how I managed to solve it.
